dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
dependencies.name: gmake

dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.
dependencies.name: perl

dependent_to.description:
This module extends the XML::Parser module by Clark Cooper. The
XML::Parser module is built on top of XML::Parser::Expat, which is a
lower level interface to James Clark's expat library.
dependent_to.name: perl-xml-dom

description:
This package contains regular expressions for the following XML tokens:
BaseChar, Ideographic, Letter, Digit, Extender, CombiningChar, NameChar,
EntityRef, CharRef, Reference, Name, NmToken, and AttValue.
name: perl-xml-regexp

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
